alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:48AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Louisa, northeastern Cumberland, Goochland, northwestern Henrico, west central Hanover and northern Powhatan Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 947 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gum Spring to near Trenholm to near Lakeside Village. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goochland, Ashland, Randolph Macon College, Cartersville, Tuckahoe, Gum Spring, Fife, Oilville, Manakin, Trenholm, Lakeside Village, Kings Dominion, Montpelier, Sabot, Wyndham, Duncan, Orchid, Crozier, Rock Castle and Vontay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
